item.title: [Excel] Bulk Linking Cells to Sheets Whose Name Equates Cell's value
item.description:
Sub CreateLinkToSheet()
    Dim c As Range
    For Each c In Selection
        ' MsgBox c.Value
        ActiveSheet.Hyperlinks.Add Anchor:=c, Address:="", _
        SubAddress:=c.Value & "!A1", TextToDisplay:=c.Value
    Next c
End Sub

How to run: Select the cells to create link and run the macro

item.title: [VBA] Save Attachements from Multiple Emails
item.description:
